1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Import
4  ( -- * Control.Monad
5    (Control.Monad.<=<),
6    (Control.Monad.>=>),
7    Control.Monad.sequence,
8    Control.Monad.filterM,
9    Control.Monad.foldM,
10    Control.Monad.when,
11    Control.Monad.unless,
12    Control.Monad.guard,
13    concatMapM,
14  
15    -- * Data.ByteString
16    Bs,
17    -- * Data.ByteString.Lazy
18    Bz,
19    -- * Data.ByteString.Lazy.UTF8
20    stringBz,
21
22    -- * Data.Default
23    Data.Default.Default (..),
24
25    -- * Data.List
26    Data.List.intercalate,
27    Data.List.intersect,
28    Data.List.isPrefixOf,
29    Data.List.isInfixOf,
30    Data.List.isSuffixOf,
31    Data.List.sort,
32    Data.List.transpose,
33    (Data.List.\\),
34  
35    -- * Data.Map
36    lookupMap,
37  
38    -- * Data.Maybe
39    Data.Maybe.catMaybes,
40    Data.Maybe.mapMaybe,
41    Data.Maybe.fromJust,
42    Data.Maybe.fromMaybe,
43  
44    -- * Data.Monoid
45    (Data.Monoid.<>),
46  
47    -- * Data.Tuple
48    Data.Tuple.swap,
49
50    -- * System.Exit
51    System.Exit.ExitCode (..),
52    System.Exit.exitWith,
53
54    -- * System.IO
55    System.IO.stdout,
56  
57    -- * Text.PrettyPrint
58    Text.PrettyPrint.Doc,
59    (Text.PrettyPrint.<+>),
60    (Text.PrettyPrint.$$),
61    Text.PrettyPrint.nest,
62    docEmpty,
63    docHang,
64    docZero,
65  ) where
66
67import qualified Control.Monad
68import qualified Data.ByteString
69import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy
70import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy.UTF8
71import qualified Data.Default
72import qualified Data.List
73import qualified Data.Map
74import qualified Data.Maybe
75import qualified Data.Monoid
76import qualified Data.Tuple
77import qualified System.IO
78import qualified System.Exit
79import qualified Text.PrettyPrint
80
81
82-- ----------------------  Control
83
84concatMapM :: (Monad m) => (a -> m [b]) -> [a] -> m [b]
85concatMapM f = return . concat Control.Monad.<=< mapM f
86
87
88-- ----------------------  Data
89
90-- | Strict bytestring.
91type Bs = Data.ByteString.ByteString
92
93-- | Lazy bytestring.
94type Bz = Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
95
96-- | Convert string into lazy bytestring.
97stringBz :: String -> Bz
98stringBz = Data.ByteString.Lazy.UTF8.fromString
99
100-- | Same as 'Map.lookup' in @Data.Map@ module.
101lookupMap :: (Ord k) => k -> Data.Map.Map k a -> Maybe a
102lookupMap = Data.Map.lookup
103
104
105-- ----------------------  Text
106
107docEmpty :: Text.PrettyPrint.Doc
108docEmpty = Text.PrettyPrint.empty
109
110docHang :: Text.PrettyPrint.Doc -> Int -> Text.PrettyPrint.Doc -> Text.PrettyPrint.Doc
111docHang = Text.PrettyPrint.hang
112
113docZero :: String -> Text.PrettyPrint.Doc
114docZero = Text.PrettyPrint.zeroWidthText
